page.title: 04EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The 1981 Census indicates that the area has a higher proportion than the national average of the working population in the professional category, and fewer unskilled workers. There is also a high proportion of families with students in Higher Education. Very few people work in manufacturing. The influence of the nearby resort of Blackpool means a large proportion work in shops,hotels and restaurants. Many Poulton residents are commuters and work in Blackpool, Preston and Manchester. Over 60% travel to work by car. Unemployment is lower than the national average-10%. In spite of a marked fear of unemployment this is a comparatively favoured area, and young people can still obtain casual work and holiday jobs.
